task.summary: Default task
Initialize IntersectionalLightingEngine rather than using static methods (since the methods are no longer static).
Initialize IntersectionalLightingEngine rather than using static methods (since the methods are no longer static).
Cleanup across the code base to deal with the new LightingEngine design.
Ray tracing test should emit a jpeg instead of a ppm.
Default camera is a pinhole camera.
Point at our cloud maven repository.
Enable snapshots.
New build pipeline config.
We need to retrieve the value of the color using the get method or the executor pool gets stuck.
Corrected test.
Working towards support for a distance estimator engine. We will be using the same basic LightingEngine functionality, but the tracing will be done using distance estimation instead of ray tracing.
Working towards support for a distance estimator engine. We will be using the same basic LightingEngine functionality, but the tracing will be done using distance estimation instead of ray tracing.

Completed support for a distance estimator engine. We are using the same basic LightingEngine functionality, but the tracing is done using distance estimation instead of ray tracing. We've fixed the null pointer issues.
RenderPanel is now using the new form of ray tracing that doesn't directly require RGB.
Corrected RenderParameters specification.
Minor changes.
AbstractSurfaceUI and SurfaceUIFactory need to be included here so that legacy xml files can be imported.
Minor changes to RayTracingTest.
The RayMarchingEngine passes along itself as the surface to render.
Added getAllSurfaces method to ShaderParameters. Added support for a striped floor in the RayTracingTest.

MESSAGE.value: Initialize IntersectionalLightingEngine rather than using static methods (since the methods are no longer static).
Cleanup across the code base to deal with the new LightingEngine design.
Ray tracing test should emit a jpeg instead of a ppm.
Default camera is a pinhole camera.
Point at our cloud maven repository.
We need to retrieve the value of the color using the get method or the executor pool gets stuck.
Working towards support for a distance estimator engine. We will be using the same basic LightingEngine functionality, but the tracing will be done using distance estimation instead of ray tracing.

Completed support for a distance estimator engine. We are using the same basic LightingEngine functionality, but the tracing is done using distance estimation instead of ray tracing. We've fixed the null pointer issues.
RenderPanel is now using the new form of ray tracing that doesn't directly require RGB.
AbstractSurfaceUI and SurfaceUIFactory need to be included here so that legacy xml files can be imported.
The RayMarchingEngine passes along itself as the surface to render.
Added getAllSurfaces method to ShaderParameters. Added support for a striped floor in the RayTracingTest.

option.value: Added getAllSurfaces method to ShaderParameters. Added support for a striped floor in the RayTracingTest.
